I'm using the new DataGrid to build a view of users.
All the column is in ReadOnly mode (I set IsReadOnly="True" in the XAML)
On every row I add a button called "Modify"  (it is in a TemplateColumn).
I would like that when the user press the Modify button, one the cells get the focus and enter in Edit mode.

(I try to create a classic edit grid with Modify, Delete, Cancel button like an ASP.NET GridView)

Is it possible? How?

Thanks
